org.spongepowered.api.text.transform

Interface PartitionedTextFormatter<E extends TextFormatter<?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - Type of formatter
    All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<E>, TextElement, TextFormatter<E>, TextRepresentable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicPartitionedTextFormatter, FixedPartitionedTextFormatter, MessageEvent.MessageFormatter

    public interface PartitionedTextFormatter<E extends TextFormatter<?>>
extends TextFormatter<E>
    Represents a TextFormatter that is sectioned into different sub-formatters.
